ygData.msgSnippet: Heh I know what you mean.  I have foraged roots on the boat, vegetables underwater, water in Ro, and berries in Permafrost.  Too bad they didn t make that a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh I know what you mean. I have foraged roots on the boat, vegetables
underwater, water in Ro, and berries in Permafrost. Too bad they didn't
make that a little more realistic, but we can't complain.

Kurik Nitesong
Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

message)


>Of course, I'm still concerned about the mysterious rabbits that seem to
leave
